... I fucking poisoned you in your sleep.
5A                                                                     5A ... that's right, you're on candid camera, try not to embarrass yourself...
Let me guess, you're trying to puke the shit out, right? Right? Don't bother...

ude, aren't you dead yet?    What the hell are you doing out there?

eah, whatever. Look, just thought you'd like to know that I'm all about hooking up with that mystery girl you've been banging as soon as your ass is underground ... I forgot to say so on that gay James Bond tape I left for you...
arlito? That's funny, I guess you didn't know... Carlito's my boy now, we're tight.
lever. Snappy. Did you pretty good, didn't I, Chelios? Come on, you can admit it.

You motherfucker, my grandfather gave that medallion to my father, and then to -

I'm nobody's little bitch, you hear me?
You're dead, you're dead, you're dead!
Scarecrow. Whatever. You get the point.
Who is this? Chelios?   IS THIS FUCKING CHELIOS?
Verona. You're not going to believe the call I just got.
This is a eighty thousand dollar ride, cockwipe!
Kaylo. My man. So, where were you last night?
I said, where were you last night?
Who would've thought that little bastard had the stones to come whack me in my own crib... it's inconceivable... and yet, here we are.
I'm dead and you're simple. Now listen: you put the word out I'm looking for Ricky Verona. Anyone sees him you call me.
I'm going to get that little son of a bitch if it's the last thing I do... it may actually be the last thing I do, understand that? Copy me on that?
DON'T TELL ME TO CALM DOWN MOTHERFUCKER!
Look, I got to find Ricky Verona ...
... right, I know, you don't know where he is, but you're going to tell me where he is, or I'm going to BLOW YOUR BRAINS INTO THAT TOILET!!
You pulled the Anselmo job together, don't try to bullshit me ...
That's not how I heard it.
Forget it. I just gotta find Ricky Verona, that little bitch ...
Look, just give me some coke, OK?    You got any coke?
Come on, man, I know you got coke.
Come on, I don't have time for this, just give me something ... I'm really dying here ...
No. You don't understand, I'm really fucking dying ... if I don't ...
May I just have some coke, please?
Seems like some Chinese assholes hired him to kill me...
What do you know about it?
Of course I pulled the trigger! WHY WOULDN'T I PULL THE TRIGGER?!
23A                                                                 23A I'm coming for you, asshole, believe me.

23A                                                                 23A Yeah, yeah, then you're going to rape my grandmother, blah blah blah. What do you think Carlito is going to think when he finds out what you did? Your whole crew is history.

It's like... it's like... like I'm slowing down... like I'm caught in a tar pit...
Not really. Actually I'm feeling pretty good right now.
Driving through a mall with five cops chasing me.
I'm having a little trouble hearing you, Doc.
That's what I'm trying to do... just keep moving... keep the blood pumping... every time I slow down it's like my veins start to rust...
Pull over.     Come on, right here.    Thank you.
OK, I'll be back in one minute.       Don't go anywhere.
Well, something urgent has come up.
What can I say. Look, Carlito, I need your help. I don't have much time.
We've got to find an antidote or something.
Well you don't have to be so damn cool about it.
What is this? Are you boys now or something?
Oh. That's outstanding, Carlito. I'm glad to know that my death can be of some use to you.
Am I being difficult? Is this what you call difficult? I don't know if you noticed, but I'm having a DIFFICULT FUCKING DAY, BRO!
orget it, I'm out of here.
I just gave you 200 dollars to wait for 3 minutes.
I'm there.     Meet me on 3rd and Flower.
Did anyone go in with him?
How you like that one, tough guy? How freaking awesome was that?
You feel like talking to me?   Where's your brother?
Nice ... wonder how many steaks I could get out of you ...
Hey Ricky, whadya think about sucking me off, ya in the mood? Maybe let me lick your ass or sumtink?
That's right, bro. You wanna guess how I got your brother's cell phone?
I can tell you have it all figured out.
What's that? I can't hear you ...
I know, I know ... hey, what's this?
A necklace? You guys really are faggots aren't you?
No thanks, but you know I believe I'll hang onto it... looks like you'll have to come find me after all. Fucked up that you killed your own brother.
What was that... epi... shit... 10 milligrams...
I'd get out of here if I were you.
That's funny. No, I'm talking about some kind of artificial adrenaline ... some shit ... you know ...
Yes!    Yes ... that's it ... you have it?
You've got epinephrine on this cart!    I want that shit!
Not going to tell you again.
I haven't got all day, just do it, will you?
How much of this stuff did he say to take?
You want it? You want this?

Replies.Reply: You were sleeping in, that's great, Eve ... super great ... you all rested now?

Well, I'm glad to hear that. Listen, I've been fatally poisoned, there's probably a psychopath heading over there to torture and kill you as we speak, but don't bother getting out of bed, I'll be there in a flash ... Maybe you could fry me up a waffle or something, kay?
You haven't turned on the TV today, right?
Didn't think so.    Listen, we've got to get out of here.
Then I need you to do something for me.
I need you to put some clothes on and come with me right now.
I'll change the clock on the microwave.
It's nothing... don't worry about it...
I SAID I'M OK, CAN WE JUST LEAVE??!!
I'm sorry ... look, can we just ...
You trying to burn down the building?
My car. Actually... I took a cab.
You know, I didn't have a lot of time to pick this out ...
Alright, here it is. I told you I was a video game programmer. That was a lie.
I kill people. I'm a professional hitman.
Last night was a job like a hundred others. A high dollar hit. Nothing special.
A hundred grand wants you dead, so sooner or later it's going to happen. But I'm not doing it.
nstead, you're going to do something for me. You're going to get out of town.
Or if you prefer, we can do it the other way, the way where I go to work and you go meet Buddah.
See: I quit. I quit the business. For you.
figure I call you that night. I tell you everything. You understand.
Yeah, well... I may be going on a trip, but you're not coming with me...
You think it sounds crazy? How do you think I feel - I've gotta live this shit...
Wait a minute. Do you trust me?
Come on. I think it'll help.
You always say you want to be more spontaneous.
Save me, Eve. Save my life.
I'M STILL ALIVE! I'M STILL ALIVE!!!
Listen to me. You don't let that motherfucker out of your sight. I'll be there in ten minutes. You got that?
I have to go. Please understand.
Right... just step on it, alright?
What'd you say was in this stuff?
It's all you, man.    Keep it.
Wait a minute, wait a minute ...
Hey, what a coincidence, you like this spot too?
Look, forget about Verona. We'll take care of him. The best thing for you to do is to find a nice, dark, quiet place and just ... die.
That's true ... we all gotta die ...
The poison? Yeah, that's true too.
Adrenaline. It's the only thing that slows it down.
Oh yeah, that's... that's really working for me...
That's it that's it that's it... just a little...
I told you, baby... I quit.
So... what are you going to do?

Replies.Reply: No... no, that's not what I want.
Hey douchebag, thought you might be interested in a little deal.
How about the jewelry I got off your faggot brother, you cocksucker?
I'll be at Downtown Standard in twenty minutes. You know the spot?
Don't be late, or I'll trade this thing to some whore for a hand job ...
It's going to be alright, baby.
I know. But things have changed. There's an antidote. I can make a deal for it, but I've got to go alone.
Of course. But you'll be safe now. And I'll be back.
Right, with you popping Valium like Tic Tacs and balling some new asshole every two weeks... why wouldn't I stick around for entertainment like that?
Mom, I got no time for this...
Don't tell me you're talking about your bro, Def Lepard.
Yeah, not so much. I don't get it - why didn't you guys just cut me up alive when you had the chance?
Who the hell are you, anyway?
I think I'm starting to figure it out.
But I'm taking you with me.
We'll see what kind of a bitch you are when Carlito hires you for half what he used to pay me... and you take it.
You'll probably throw boss a nice little reach-around just to show what a good bitch you are.
Is that what I think it is?
I told you I'd kill you, you son of a bitch!
Hey doll. Looks like I let you down again. You were right about me ... funny, you really have time to reflect on things when you know you're going to die ...
I'm glad you called, but I'm not here.
... then just ... oh, wait ... time's up -
Hey. Did you try to call?
Is this your new look or something?
It's ... completely appalling.    Very you, Chev.
Are you looking for my other boyfriend?
What are you talking about?    Don't be such a freak.
Actually, I'm glad you're here. Can you change the clock on the microwave?
Yeah. I never changed it back.   You know, daylight savings time.
That's sweet. Are you OK? You look like you're on drugs or something.
Oh darn! I forgot, the waffle iron's on if you want to make one.
You're so stressed out, do you want some pot?
That was just totally uncalled for.
The waffle thing. I forgot to turn it off.
You know, I could use a little help here.
Hm.   So why are we here?
Mob hits, Chev? Chinese poison? Do you know how ridiculous you sound? If you're going to break up with me, at least you can tell me the truth.
Get off!   Are you kidding me?
Take me right here in front of everyone.
Tell me you're joking.    Now you can't get it up?
No. Chev. I DO NOT UNDERSTAND.
YOU'LL BURN IN HELL FOR THIS!!!
DON'T TALK TO ME LIKE THAT!! MY BOYFRIEND KILLS PEOPLE!!!
I had to see if you were telling the truth... oh, and you have my purse.
Darn it, I forgot to take my birth control pill.
No, I mean: that you were going to give it all up for me.
Come on, let's finish what you started.
How can you... how can you do that...?
Doctor Miles' office, may I help you?
Chev! I just saw Verona's brother going into Charlie O's.
Yeah.    I was just down here getting a taco.    He went right in, like, 2 minutes ago.
I'm across the street, getting a taco.
Yeah, yeah.     You wanna know what I was doing?
What? What? You heard me.      That son of a bitch Ricky Verona.
I think I know what I have to do.
Got to kick... some black... ass.
Sorry, I must take this. See you later.
You know, man, I kind of like that shit you put in me. Think you can get me some more?
I know you motherfuckers have epinephrine!
You.   Get me some ... I need ...
I bought you some flowers, but they got fucked up on the way over here.
Aww, damn it, I'm sorry baby...
What the fuck is this, you working for the Chinese now?
Found a new master, you little bitch, is that it?
It's cool it's cool it's cool!
I'm talking! What are we talking about?
OK, nobody's fucking with you, just calm down ...
There's a white man with a gun in here, I would prefer that he not cap my ass, so please refrain from any sudden ass bullshit!
THE WHITE MAN IS COOL!   THE WHITE MAN IS COOL!
Can we all just get along?   Can we?
Now Chevy here has something he would like to discuss. So we are going to discuss it. In a civilized manner.
OK. I am not affiliated with Ricky Verona.
Easy ... easy ... now things are beginning to clarify ... you see how that works? How discussion can lead to clarity?

Clearly you are operating under a false pretense. Ricky Verona and myself did not "pull the Anselmo job together." In fact, Ricky Verona fucked me on the Anselmo job. In fact, Ricky Verona owes me seventy five hunna dollars.
But that's the way it is. That's the way it is. So you see, I don't know where Ricky Verona is. Because if I knew where he is, I would probably be there right now, beating his Gucci ass down.
Thank you. That's what I'm talking about. That resembles civility.
Shit dude, what's the matter with you?
I understand that. You've made that point abundantly clear to all of us.
Now what can I do to help you?
You think every brother is carrying, is that it?
So this is medicinal use coke, that's what you're telling me.
You got something for me, or what?
W hy you looking for Verona anyway?
Ah, so this is about the Don Kim situation.
I know you pulled the trigger.
Well, a man's got to do what a man's got to do.
Uhh... what exactly is it that you got to do?
But you know this has got to stop sometime. What do you think you are, Michael Myers? They pop you and you just keep gettin up?
ou a persistent motherfucker, Chev Chelios, I'll give you that.
Sorry baby, I just got the message.
Alright, slow down. You say you've been poisoned. Can you describe the symptoms?
The flow of adrenaline is keeping you alive.
Listen, Chev - you have to keep moving.
If I'm right, they gave you the Beijing Cocktail... very nasty ... works on your adrenal gland, blocking your receptors.
Meaning: if you stop, you die.
Oh boy. Well, that's a start. Look, I'll be back in LA in an hour. I'll call you as soon as I land. Keep yourself pumped up. Don't stop, don't quit, I'll be there.
Relax. I mean don't relax. Listen to me. The shit they gave you is cutting off your adrenaline.
Your only shot is to massively increase the level of ephedrine in your body ...
You've got to get to an emergency room and get yourself some epinephrine ...
I'm in the air, man.     Did you get the stuff I told you?
You shot the whole thing, didn't you?
Oh boy. I said a fifth of a syringe, you idiot. Now you're dead for sure.
You got a steel hard on.
That's the stimulation of the blood vessels ... your urinary sphincter is tight as a knot ... couldn't pee to save your life ...
Maybe you can get a hold of some vicadin ... you still at the hospital?
Maybe some weed ... I don't know ...

Well, that shit should be out of your system in a half hour or so, if you live that long ... this air phone is costing me a fortune ... look, I'll be in LA in twenty minutes. I'll call you when I hit the ground.
You're a good kid, Chev.   Nice knowing you.
Chevy! Holy shit, man, I've been trying to reach you for a half hour.
I'm at my office. Can you get here?
Oh, I also gave you a little meth.
Fuck no. You're in such shit shape it's stunning. I've never seen a heart take this kind of punishment and keep ticking.
The solution I'm giving you is acting as a competitive inhibitor... meaning it pushes the poison out of your receptors and replaces it with a chemical... it's a temporary fix...
Look, if we put you on life support we could maybe string you out for a few days, but at some point you'd almost certainly lapse into a coma... and then...
f you want, I can load you up with something, you'll go out in a beautiful dream.
Can I do that for you, Chev?
Where you want to go, man?
You're not getting into my cab wet.
You are not getting into my car no way.
I love America! I love Bush!
Word travels fast.     You amaze me, my friend.
The shit they gave you ... it's the Chinese shit. There is no antidote.     I wish there was something I could do.
Honestly, you should be dead already.
We give that shit to horses ...
What do you expect me to do?
Verona? That's just a small time punk.

re you disrespecting me, Chev?    Is that what you're doing?
Chelios... what a fucking mess you are.

Get me out of here! NOW!

... and Hong Kong gets a goat to take the fall. Please understand, Chev, it's truly nothing personal.
